list.historyEntry:
I'm getting the following error while syncing my project. The error is: The request for this plugin could not be satisfied because the plugin is already on the classpath with an unknown version, so compatibility cannot be checked ``` Build file '/Users/ikarenkov/Documents/development/Modo/modo-compose/build.gradle.kts' line: 3
Error resolving plugin [id: 'modo-android-library', version: 'unspecified'] > The request for this plugin could not be satisfied because the plugin is already on the classpath with an unknown version, so compatibility cannot be checked.
* Try: > Run with --info or --debug option to get more log output. > Run with --scan to get full insights. > Get more help at https://help.gradle.org.
... Caused by: org.gradle.plugin.management.internal.InvalidPluginRequestException: The request for this plugin could not be satisfied because the plugin is already on the classpath with an unknown version, so compatibility cannot be checked. at org.gradle.plugin.use.resolve.internal.AlreadyOnClasspathPluginResolver.resolve(AlreadyOnClasspathPluginResolver.java:89) at org.gradle.plugin.use.internal.DefaultPluginRequestApplicator.resolvePluginRequest(DefaultPluginRequestApplicator.java:189) ... 205 more ``` How do I fix this?
This problem acured after updating gradle version from 8.7 to 8.13. I removed update of agp to find the root cause
You are wrong, your suggestion offers just replace alias with id, but it has nothing to do with root cause

I'm getting the following error while syncing my project. The error is: Task with name 'mergeLintSarif' not found in root project 'Modo' ``` Build file '/Users/ikarenkov/Documents/development/Modo/modo-compose/build.gradle.kts' line: 3
An exception occurred applying plugin request [id: 'modo-android-library', version: 'unspecified'] > Failed to apply plugin 'modo-android-library'. > Task with name 'mergeLintSarif' not found in root project 'Modo'.
* Try: > Run with --info or --debug option to get more log output. > Run with --scan to get full insights. > Get more help at https://help.gradle.org. ... Caused by: org.gradle.api.UnknownTaskException: Task with name 'mergeLintSarif' not found in root project 'Modo'. at org.gradle.api.internal.tasks.DefaultTaskCollection.createNotFoundException(DefaultTaskCollection.java:119) at org.gradle.api.internal.tasks.DefaultTaskCollection.createNotFoundException(DefaultTaskCollection.java:47) at org.gradle.api.internal.DefaultNamedDomainObjectCollection.named(DefaultNamedDomainObjectCollection.java:386) at org.gradle.api.internal.tasks.DefaultTaskCollection.named(DefaultTaskCollection.java:129) ``` How do I fix this?

I'm getting the following error while syncing my project. The error is: Extension of type 'KotlinJvmProjectExtension' does not exist. Currently registered extension types: [ExtraPropertiesExtension, LibrariesForLibs, VersionCatalogsExtension, RootProjectAccessor, BasePluginExtension, DefaultArtifactPublicationSet, SourceSetContainer, ReportingExtension, JavaToolchainService, JavaPluginExtension, LibraryExtension, LibraryAndroidComponentsExtension, NamedDomainObjectContainer<BaseVariantOutput>, KotlinAndroidProjectExtension, KotlinTestsRegistry] ``` Build file '/Users/ikarenkov/Documents/development/KombuchaUdf/kombucha/compose/build.gradle.kts' line: 1
An exception occurred applying plugin request [id: 'kombucha-android-library', version: 'unspecified'] > Failed to apply plugin 'kombucha-android-library'. > Extension of type 'KotlinJvmProjectExtension' does not exist. Currently registered extension types: [ExtraPropertiesExtension, LibrariesForLibs, VersionCatalogsExtension, RootProjectAccessor, BasePluginExtension, DefaultArtifactPublicationSet, SourceSetContainer, ReportingExtension, JavaToolchainService, JavaPluginExtension, LibraryExtension, LibraryAndroidComponentsExtension, NamedDomainObjectContainer<BaseVariantOutput>, KotlinAndroidProjectExtension, KotlinTestsRegistry]
* Try: > Run with --info or --debug option to get more log output. > Run with --scan to get full insights. > Get more help at https://help.gradle.org. ... Caused by: org.gradle.api.UnknownDomainObjectException: Extension of type 'KotlinJvmProjectExtension' does not exist. Currently registered extension types: [ExtraPropertiesExtension, LibrariesForLibs, VersionCatalogsExtension, RootProjectAccessor, BasePluginExtension, DefaultArtifactPublicationSet, SourceSetContainer, ReportingExtension, JavaToolchainService, JavaPluginExtension, LibraryExtension, LibraryAndroidComponentsExtension, NamedDomainObjectContainer<BaseVariantOutput>, KotlinAndroidProjectExtension, KotlinTestsRegistry] at org.gradle.internal.extensibility.ExtensionsStorage.getHolderByType(ExtensionsStorage.java:88) at org.gradle.internal.extensibility.ExtensionsStorage.configureExtension(ExtensionsStorage.java:70) at org.gradle.internal.extensibility.DefaultConvention.configure(DefaultConvention.java:205) at io.github.ikarenkov.kombucha.KotlinAndroidKt.configureKotlin(KotlinAndroid.kt:94) ``` How do I fix this?
How do I test an Android app?
